characters.value: <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 1000 1000"><defs><clipPath id="radical_svg_id_a_8786"><path d="M340 380h320v440H340z" style="fill:none"/></clipPath><style>.radical-svg-cls-b-8786{fill:none;stroke:var(--color-text, #000);stroke-linecap:square;stroke-miterlimit:2;stroke-width:68px}</style></defs><path d="M60 820h880M140 580h720M240 140h520v240H240z" class="radical-svg-cls-b-8786"/><path d="M500 820V380" class="radical-svg-cls-b-8786" style="clip-path:url(#radical_svg_id_a_8786)"/></svg>

meaningMnemonic: The "soil mouth" is the mouth that eats the soil. The animal that does this best is the <radical>worm</radical>. Nom nom nom.
